divs: Sighting Details We have seen this befor almost in the same spot with 3 lights red wight and green. the craft seems to hover and shot up and down and swing side to side and sometimes doing a figer 8 like movement. ther was no sound from the object u could see it was swinging its lights to the west then the east. the oject moved to the east and got behind some trees and i cound not see it any more. ther was another object to the north of it doing the same thing...
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Disk shap object hoverd over for long time and moved all around spining back in forth
trends: There have been no other sightings in seney
This sighting has never been favorited.
